categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Saveel Yacommsa was a male Sith Pureblood officer of the Sith Empire living during the Eternal Empire conquest. By 3630 BBY he was wanted by the Eternal Empire for murder, treason, and espionage. He was last seen in the lower city of Zakuul and his wanted poster was displayed in the Overwatch.
Saveel Yacommsa appears during "Chapter 10: Anarchy in Paradise" of Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire on a wanted holo-poster.
